none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on December 16, 2020 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Like an old friend, TERMINUS stopped by yesterday with four doses of strong, proud, heavy fucking metal. I let them in, I let them share, and I became one with their offering. You could do the same, and let TERMINUS take you to a fantastical time when simply being was the first step. And being metal was the only thing in your sights? Oh...you've never been in that time? I recommend it. INTO EXILE...

seo.title: Terminus - Into Exile... - Terminal Escape
